title: Lapis Development Sample
description:
Blue dominates.  Plain weave or Twill variation.
Similar to Pomegranate. Blue, green & olive warp. Light, 3 green weft.  Plain weave variation.  Stapled to 8.5x11\" card along with 99.1.1213.10, 11, & 12.  \"H-8B\" written on card.  Some notes on reverse.)
